Name: Name Change, John Malone Community Center, Brooklyn
Title: A Local Law in relation to a park house name, John Malone Community Center, in McGuire Park, Borough of Brooklyn.
Text:
Be it enacted by the Council as follows:


	Section 1. The following park house name is hereby designated as hereafter indicated.

New NamePresent NameLimitsJohn Malone Community CenterNonethe park house in McGuire Park, Borough of Brooklyn
	ï¿½2. This local law shall take effect immediately upon its enactment into law.













LS Request # 829
